
# PayTabs 
![paytabs](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/paytabs/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `paytabs` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] PayTabs 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  PayTabs is a one stop shop for all your payment needs and provides customers in the Middle East with simple and trusted online payment solutions that include online invoicing for customers who sell through their websites or Social Media AccountsØŒ PayTabs also offers E-commerce plugins for resellers and online service providers who sell through online stores. Apart from all that, PayTabs also has a unique mobile payment solution and an online store builder ready to be launched in the coming months.
